nodes.text: The cerulean droch was a type of green colored creature from the planet Felucia. In 10 BBY, the crime lord Dryden Vos kept the remains of a cerulean droch on display in a case in his study on board his yacht, the First Light.

The corpse of a cerulean droch first appeared in the 2018 Anthology series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. They were first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
